prTitle: feat: implement election management interface for PTA voting admin panel
prBody:
## Summary

Implements the election management interface (issue #120) with full CRUD operations for election configuration and status management.

### Features Implemented

**Admin API Endpoints:**
- `GET /api/voting/admin/election` - Get current election configuration
- `PUT /api/voting/admin/election/status` - Update election status (SETUP/ACTIVE/CLOSED)
- `POST /api/voting/admin/election/positions` - Add new position to election
- `DELETE /api/voting/admin/election/positions/<position>` - Remove position from election
- `require_admin_session()` helper for authentication validation

**Admin Dashboard UI:**
- `Dashboard.jsx` - Main admin interface with tab navigation
- `ElectionManagement.jsx` - Full election management component
- Admin route handling in `VotingApp.jsx` for `/voting/admin`

**Election Management Features:**
- Real-time election status display with color-coded indicators
- Status transition buttons (SETUP → ACTIVE → CLOSED) with API integration
- Position configuration form (add/remove positions)
- Automatic timestamp management for election start/end times
- Auto-refresh functionality (30-second intervals)
- Comprehensive error handling and validation
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS

### Acceptance Criteria Met

✅ **Position configuration form functional (add/edit positions)**
- Add position form with input validation
- Remove position functionality with confirmation
- Real-time position list updates

✅ **Status toggle buttons update election state via API**
- Three status buttons: Setup, Activate, Close
- API integration with proper error handling
- Automatic timestamp management

✅ **Current election status displayed and updates in real-time**
- Color-coded status badges
- Auto-refresh every 30 seconds
- Manual refresh button
- Election details display (name, description, dates)

✅ **Form validation and error handling implemented**
- Input validation for empty fields
- API error display with user-friendly messages
- Loading states during API calls
- Confirmation dialogs for destructive actions

### Technical Implementation

**Backend (Flask):**
- Admin authentication middleware
- Election data management via VotingDataStore
- RESTful API design with proper HTTP status codes
- Thread-safe data operations

**Frontend (React):**
- React hooks for state management (useState, useEffect)
- AuthContext integration for admin authentication
- Fetch API for backend communication
- Real-time UI updates and error handling

### Testing

- Manual verification of all API endpoints
- Component structure validation
- Error handling scenarios tested
- Admin authentication flow verified

Closes #120
